response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to you, worth $1,000,000. I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this masterpiece at a special price of $950,000. This is an opportunity to secure a piece that not only meets but surpasses your needs and desires. Let's discuss how we can make this acquisition a reality.", "product_price": 950000}
